channel.title: Multi word args

item.title: Multi word args
item.dc:creator: @demon_fox337 demon fox337
item.description:
@demon_fox337 wrote:

i have a command im making and i want it to have 3 args
the command name
the target player
and a bunch of random words separated by spaces ex
::lolowned myplayername i like pie

heres all you should need to help me =S

problems in red if i were to type the command in game it would read it as command target and first word of the sentence in this case its i sorry i randomly felt like coloring that i

String[] args = command.split(" ");
String player = (args[1]);
String Texts1 = (args[2]);

Read full topic
